headlines.description: Manchester United's hopes of qualifying for the Champions League took a huge blow as they suffered a humiliating 4-0 defeat at Everton.

video.headline: Man United languishing in 6th after Everton pummeling

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlight (Man United languishing in 6th after Everton pummeling) 20190421 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Man United suffer crushing defeat at Everton

headlines.description: Crystal Palace took their chances well in a 3-2 win against Arsenal at the Emirates on Sunday that left the hosts in fourth place.

video.headline: Arsenal hit a snag in top-4 race with loss to Palace

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC HIGHLIGHT (Arsenal hit a snag in top-4 race with loss to Palace) 2019/04/21 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal dumped at home by Palace, still fourth

headlines.description: Liverpool returned to the top of the table with a hard-fought 2-0 victory over Cardiff thanks to goals from Georginio Wijnaldum and a James Milner.

video.headline: Milner doubles Liverpool's lead after Salah wins penalty

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC One Play (Milner doubles Liverpool's lead after Salah wins penalty) 2019/04/21 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool top thanks to tough win at Cardiff
